comment: Fogged up lenses , cured instant heating , lasted /4 hr sat on top of my lens . Boiled in water after use , ready to use again ... Disposable one's are too slow and not green .. Cogies Top Tip Wouldn't buy cheap one's incase they leak into the lens . <URL>
